dict.acceptation: 满足；配药；（按订单）供应；使充满（感情）；
填满…的量；充分；装填物；路堤；

sent.orig: FILL fills a drink container with water.
sent.trans: FILL用以把一个容器装满水。

sent.orig: At Christmasalways, may peacelove fill your heart, beauty fill your world, contentmentjoy fill your days.
sent.trans: 愿女儿的圣诞祝福带给你快乐。

sent.orig: Each Registration Form should only fill-in ONE person's detail only. Please clearly fill-in this Registration Form.
sent.trans: 本注册表格应只填写一人资料。敬请清楚填写本注册表格。

sent.orig: At Christmas and always, may peace and love fill your heart, beauty fill your world.
sent.trans: 圣诞的祝愿，平居的希冀，愿心境平和、充裕意，愿的世界全是美满。

sent.orig: Fill up the final control report seriously and fill in the additional problem report.
sent.trans: 认真填写终检报告单，并清晰地注明所发现的问题。
